description: This file contains the implementation of a Flutter widget named FilterScreen, which provides a user interface for filtering options such as hair color, race, religion, height, and weight. It utilizes provider-based state management to read and modify filter criteria, and includes UI elements like checkboxes and range sliders.

classes.name: FilterScreen
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides UI for filtering options including checkboxes for categorical filters and sliders for numerical ranges.

classes.name: _FilterScreenState
classes.description: State class for FilterScreen that manages local state for height and weight ranges and builds the widget tree.

methods.name: createState
methods.description: Creates the mutable state for the FilterScreen widget.

methods.name: initState
methods.description: Initializes local height and weight ranges from the provider's criteria.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the filter UI, including checkboxes, sliders, and buttons.

search-terms: range slider for height and weight
